name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Mack TRUESDALE, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Mack TRUESDALE, Appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
414 A.2d 310
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Mack TRUESDALE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 24, 1980.
Decided May 30, 1980.
Robert B. Mozenter, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Division, Asst. Dist. Atty., Ellen Mattleman, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
